availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Cornelia A. Stroud Webb on June 13, 1861. Father of Albert D. Webb, Robert L. Webb, and Mary E. Webb. Farmer in Grant County in 1850 and 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Grant County in 1860. Served in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private and 2nd Lieutenant from 1861 to 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 357A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Unknown District, p. 178.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Unknown District, p. 8.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Williamstown Precinct, p. 26.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 001490815, p. 15.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 135.
